green-apple-yogurt-salad.name: Green Apple and Yogurt Salad
green-apple-yogurt-salad.description: A vibrant and refreshing salad that delights your senses. The crisp tartness of green apple combines with cool cucumber and creamy yogurt for a harmonious, light combination. Perfect as an appetizer, side dish, or any-time meal. ü•óüçè

steps.1: Wash the apples and cucumber thoroughly. Peel the cucumber and slice it thinly. Cut the apples into cubes, leaving the peel on if preferred.
steps.2: In a large bowl, mix the natural yogurt with lemon juice and honey. Stir well until fully combined.
steps.3: Add the apples and cucumber to the yogurt mixture. Toss gently to coat.
steps.4: Mix in the chopped walnuts and raisins, distributing them evenly.
steps.5: Wash and dry the lettuce leaves. Arrange them on a serving platter.
steps.6: Spoon the apple-cucumber salad over the lettuce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
steps.7: Refrigerate for at least 15 minutes before serving to let flavors meld.

chickpea-spinach-burgers.name: Chickpea and Spinach Burgers
chickpea-spinach-burgers.description: A delicious and healthy option, perfect for any occasion and easy to make. They're juicy, full of flavor, and easy to prepare, ideal for vegetarians and healthy food lovers. üçîüå±

steps.1: Rinse and drain the cooked chickpeas and place them in a large bowl.
steps.2: Add the chopped spinach, onion, and minced garlic to the bowl.
steps.3: Mash the chickpeas and mix with the other ingredients until well combined.
steps.4: Season with ground cumin, sweet paprika, salt, and pepper.
steps.5: Add the bread crumbs, olive oil, and salt to the mixture and mix well until all ingredients are combined..
steps.6: Form the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.
steps.7: Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the patties for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
steps.8: Remove the burgers from the pan and place them on paper towels to remove excess oil.
steps.9: Serve with lettuce leaves, tomato slices, and hamburger buns.

chocolate-banana-smoothie.name: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
chocolate-banana-smoothie.description: A delicious and nutritious smoothie that combines the sweetness of bananas with the richness of cocoa. Perfect for breakfast or a snack! üçåü•§

steps.1: Peel the banana and cut it into slices.
steps.2: In a blender, combine the banana, cocoa powder, milk, honey, and ice cubes.
steps.4: Pour into a glass and enjoy!

fresh-cucumber-jalape√±o-salad.name: Fresh Cucumber Jalape√±o Salad
fresh-cucumber-jalape√±o-salad.description: A vibrant and flavorful salad that combines the crisp freshness of cucumber with the bold, spicy kick of jalape√±os. Perfect as a side dish to enhance any dish or as a light and delicious option on its own. üå∂Ô∏èü•í

steps.1: Wash the cucumber and jalape√±o peppers thoroughly. Peel the cucumber and cut it into small cubes.
steps.2: Peel the jalape√±o peppers and slice them into thin strips.
steps.3: Chop the purple onion into small pieces.
steps.4: In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Whisk well until all ingredients are combined.
steps.5: Place the cucumber, jalape√±o peppers, and onion in separate bowls.
steps.6: Pour the dressing mixture over the salad and toss gently to coat all ingredients in the dressing.
steps.7: If desired, add the chopped fresh cilantro and mix again.
steps.8: Let the salad sit in the refrigerator for at least 15 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to blend.
steps.9: Serve the fresh cucumber and jalape√±o salad as a side dish or as a light main dish. Enjoy!

diary-free-pancakes.name: Fluffy Diary-Free Pancakes
diary-free-pancakes.description: The perfect choice for a spicy breakfast or snack. Dairy-free and with an irresistible touch of vanilla, they're the ideal base to pair with honey, fresh fruit, or even a little melted chocolate. ü•ûüçì

steps.1: In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder and a pinch of salt.
steps.2: In another bowl, beat the egg and add the water (or any vegetable milk of your choice) and vanilla extract, mixing well.
steps.3: Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until combined.
steps.4: Heat a frying pan over medium heat and grease it with a little butter.
steps.5: Pour a ladle of batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
steps.6: Flip the pancake and cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
steps.8: Serve the pancakes with your favorite toppings, such as sliced bananas, berries, or a sprinkle of cinnamon.

tropical-coconut-punch.name: Tropical Coconut Punch
tropical-coconut-punch.description: A delicious and refreshing blend of fresh coconut and aromatic spices that evoke the sea breeze and tropical vibes. A delight for your senses that will make you feel like you're on the beach! üå¥‚ú®

steps.1: In a blender, combine the coconut milk, condensed milk, whole milk, and sugar. Blend at high speed until all ingredients are well combined.
steps.2: If you want to add white rum, add it while still blending. Add vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and nutmeg. Mix until smooth.
steps.3: Add the grated coconut and mix gently with a spoon so that it is evenly distributed.
steps.4: If you prefer a smoother texture, you can strain the mixture to remove any lumps from the shredded coconut.
steps.5: Refrigerate the mixture for at least 1 hour to ensure it is completely chilled.
steps.6: For serving, fill a tall glass with ice and pour the coconut punch over the ice.
steps.7: Garnish with pineapple slices and cherries on top before enjoying.

baked-french-toast.name: Baked French Toast
baked-french-toast.description: Enjoy French toast bursting with flavor. This recipe is perfect for those looking for a dairy-free and no-fries option, combining the natural sweetness of fruit with the crunchy texture of baked bread.üçìü•ñ

steps.1: Preheat oven to 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper or spray with cooking spray.
steps.2: In a large bowl, beat the eggs together with the almond milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt until well combined.
steps.3: Dip each slice of whole wheat bread into the egg mixture, making sure both sides are well coated.
steps.4: Place the bread slices on the prepared baking sheet.
steps.5: Bake the toasts in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, turning them over halfway through, until golden brown and cooked through.
steps.6: While the toast is baking, prepare the fruit. Slice the banana and strawberries and mix with the blueberries in a bowl.
steps.7: Once the toast is ready, remove it from the oven and place it on individual plates.
steps.8: Top each toast with a generous portion of the fruit mixture.
steps.9: Drizzle maple syrup over toast and fruit before serving.
steps.10: Serve warm and enjoy your delicious, flavorful French toast with fruit!

chicken-with-fresh-vegetables.name: Chicken with Fresh Vegetables
chicken-with-fresh-vegetables.description: An exquisite marinated chicken, bursting with vibrant flavors thanks to a blend of spices and fresh vegetables. This dish combines tradition and freshness in every bite, leaving everyone wanting more.üçóü•ï

steps.1: In a large bowl, combine the vinegar, water, sugar, oregano, bay leaf, salt, and pepper. Add the chicken pieces and let marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, preferably overnight.
steps.2: In a large pot, heat a little oil and saut√© the chopped onion and garlic until golden.
steps.3: Add the marinated chicken pieces (reserve the marinade) and brown on all sides for about 5-7 minutes.
steps.4: Add the tomatoes, bell pepper, panca chilies, spring onion, and celery. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
steps.5: Pour the reserved marinade over the chicken and vegetables. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and tender.
steps.6: While the chicken is cooking, prepare the rice. In a separate pot, boil 2 cups of lightly salted water. Add the rice and simmer until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender, about 15-20 minutes.
steps.7: Once the chicken is done, remove it from the heat and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
steps.8: Serve the pickled chicken hot, accompanied by white rice.
steps.9: Garnish with welsh onion and enjoy your delicious pickled chicken with fresh vegetables!

colorful-stir-fried-vegetables.name: Colorful Stir-Fried Vegetables
colorful-stir-fried-vegetables.description: This colorful stir-fry is a vibrant and healthy mix of bell peppers, onions, carrots, and peas, all saut√©ed al dente and seasoned with a hint of lemon. Perfect as a side dish or as a light main dish.ü•ïüå∂Ô∏èüçã

steps.1: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
steps.2: Add the minced garlic and saut√© for 1 minute until fragrant.
steps.3: Add the onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until translucent.
steps.4: Add the peppers and carrots, and saut√© for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
steps.5: Add the green peas and cook for another 3-4 minutes until all vegetables are tender but still crisp.
steps.6: Add the lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
steps.7: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
steps.8: Remove from heat and garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.
